Text:
What is the mean PPV ?? 
Is it like DVD?
Afaik, it is Pay Per View.
And just to add, it would be rental through cable (TV) or internet (streamed).

Apparently PPV's are coming mainly from Hotel PPV systems, which get the movies before DVD release. International flights also have movies, usually in SD 4:3, way before DVD release, although usually they're free for the passengers (not PPV).
Quality varies, see samples.
